CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Turn horizontal segments on or off.
CONTROLS.NAME: hori_sg

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Turn vertical segments on or off.
CONTROLS.NAME: vert_sg

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Turn diagonal segments on or off.
CONTROLS.NAME: diag_sg

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Turn stick segments on or off.
CONTROLS.NAME: stick_sg

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Turn sphere segments on or off.
CONTROLS.NAME: sphere_sg

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: When this is ON, the tubes will bump with drum hits, when OFF, they'll keep a constant thickness.
CONTROLS.NAME: auto_thickness

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Thickness of the tubes and spheres. Default 25%.
CONTROLS.NAME: thickness

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: 0% is fully flat. 100% is high pointed peaks. Default is 25%.
CONTROLS.NAME: perturbation

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Floor will automatically change from flat to perturbed slowly as the music energy rises and falls.
CONTROLS.NAME: auto_perturb

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Turn ON for audio-reactive blinking floor. You'll need to choose a floor color that is non-black as well.
CONTROLS.NAME: blinking_floor

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: ON to make the 3D lighting overblown and sharp.
CONTROLS.NAME: overblown

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: ON make the 3D lighting flat and blurred.
CONTROLS.NAME: flat_blurred

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: ON for a smooth, glossy floor, or OFF for the low-poly triangle floor.
CONTROLS.NAME: glossy

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: How much of the floor the media covers. Default 50%, up to make it small and tiled, down to make it huge.
CONTROLS.NAME: media_scale

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Defines the scale of the space. Down to zoom in, up to zoom out. Best to just click a new spot, not use smoothly.
CONTROLS.NAME: zoom

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Color of the pipes.
CONTROLS.NAME: pipe_col

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: The color of the floor. Make this non-black to use the blinking floor effect. If you have media selected, this is ignored.
CONTROLS.NAME: floor_col

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Turn ON for red/cyan split when the bass hits, or OFF for a constant split controlled by the slider.
CONTROLS.NAME: auto_split

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Turn ON to splits the red and cyan color channels, but also keep the unchanged original colors, or OFF for just red/cyan.
CONTROLS.NAME: incl_original

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Turn ON for a noisier split efect, or off for the standard split.
CONTROLS.NAME: noisy_split

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Default: 0%, meaning split effect is off. Turn up to increase the intensity of the red/cyan split effect.
CONTROLS.NAME: split_amt

DESCRIPTION: A hybrid point-lit, flat-shaded terrain with a mesh structure on it.
TITLE: Terrain Lattice_dup
